ProteinName	DNA-binding protein REPIN1 (60 kDa origin-specific DNA-binding protein) (60 kDa replication initiation region protein) (ATT-binding protein) (DHFR oribeta-binding protein RIP60) (Zinc finger protein 464)
GeneName	REPIN1 RIP60 ZNF464
Length	624
Function	Sequence-specific double-stranded DNA-binding protein (PubMed:10606657, PubMed:11328883, PubMed:2174103, PubMed:2247056, PubMed:8355269). Binds ATT-rich and T-rich DNA sequences and facilitates DNA bending (PubMed:10606657, PubMed:11328883, PubMed:2174103, PubMed:2247056, PubMed:8355269). May regulate the expression of genes involved in cellular fatty acid import, including SCARB1/CD36, and genes involved in lipid droplet formation (By similarity). May regulate the expression of LCN2, and thereby influence iron metabolism and apoptosis-related pathways (By similarity). May regulate the expression of genes involved in glucose transport (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Cytosol
